definitions.definition: A secular ecclesiastic , or one not bound by monastic rules .
A church official whose functions are confined to the vocal department of the choir .
A layman , as distinguished from a clergyman .

main_definition: A secular ecclesiastic , or one not bound by monastic rules .
secondary_definitions: A church official whose functions are confined to the vocal department of the choir .
A layman , as distinguished from a clergyman .
